column4: I've been using Ubuntu for just over six months now, and prior to that, RH based distros, so I know how to install software.  But automatix is tempting...Like the dark side...Quicker, Easier.
My suggestion is Synaptic and aptitude if you want quick and easy.
Yeah, that's what I have been using.  Do you know if there is a handy repository that contains the "illegal" software automatix will install?  i.e. the DVD player and Win Codecs?
Look up the Seveas stuff on the wiki.
